about_the_game:
A new Backrooms experience!

Do you have the guts to escape from level 0? Explore and survive in this single player adventure, or team up with friends in 4-player multiplayer to increase your chances of escape. Are you able to find the four keys that will open up the only exit from this maze? Use all your senses as you try to find your way around this glitch.


Let your chat become a part of the adventure!

Link your Twitch channel and let your viewers decide what misfortunes happen to you in level 0. Your viewers can interact with the game and influence your choices as you play. With their help, will you be able to unravel the secrets of the backrooms and find your way out? (This feature is experimental. We were curious to include this feature and try it out in general. Please don't be upset if the Twitch integration doesn't work properly in some cases from a technical point of view).


Here is a handy list of things you can try out:

  • Solo mode for brave adventurers
  • multiplayer mode for up to four players
  • Twitch chat integration - Link your channel and let your viewers decide your fate
  • Gamepad support

and especially important:
  • You can give us your feedback about the prototype, your experience and be influential on the future of this idea. Should we continue working on Level 0?


Are you ready to enter the backrooms and discover what lies within? Download “Level 0: A Backrooms Experience” now for free and get started on your journey! Please leave your feedback in the forum or join our discord and tell us what you think about this prototype!

With Love,
Headup
detailed_description:
We need your feedback!


You can reach out to us about this prototype through Steam, Discord or social media. Feel free to tell us more about your experience with "LEVEL 0: A Backrooms Experience". Do you have any suggestions? If you want more of this game, we'll make it happen. Let your voice be heard and help shape the future of this exciting and unique gaming experience. We thrive on your feedback and we want to create something special with your help!


About the Demo

A new Backrooms experience!

Do you have the guts to escape from level 0? Explore and survive in this single player adventure, or team up with friends in 4-player multiplayer to increase your chances of escape. Are you able to find the four keys that will open up the only exit from this maze? Use all your senses as you try to find your way around this glitch.


Let your chat become a part of the adventure!

Link your Twitch channel and let your viewers decide what misfortunes happen to you in level 0. Your viewers can interact with the game and influence your choices as you play. With their help, will you be able to unravel the secrets of the backrooms and find your way out? (This feature is experimental. We were curious to include this feature and try it out in general. Please don't be upset if the Twitch integration doesn't work properly in some cases from a technical point of view).


Here is a handy list of things you can try out:

  • Solo mode for brave adventurers
  • multiplayer mode for up to four players
  • Twitch chat integration - Link your channel and let your viewers decide your fate
  • Gamepad support

and especially important:
  • You can give us your feedback about the prototype, your experience and be influential on the future of this idea. Should we continue working on Level 0?


Are you ready to enter the backrooms and discover what lies within? Download “Level 0: A Backrooms Experience” now for free and get started on your journey! Please leave your feedback in the forum or join our discord and tell us what you think about this prototype!

With Love,

name: LEVEL 0: A Backrooms Experience Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8/10/11-64 bit
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 or AMD R380 series or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Reality blurs and turns surreal. You find yourself trapped in a maze of endless twisting hallways and rooms, with nothing but your fading wits to guide you back to freedom. Explore the backrooms and try to survive in this single player adventure - or team up with three friends!
